title: I’m on process to file a Divorce plus I’m going to file a bankruptcy Charter 7 I can do both on the same time.
question: I’m filing a Bankruptcy charter 7 on the same time I’m filing my divorce.
answers: You can do them at the same time, but you should consult with both types of attorney to know if there is a strategic advantage in planning which to do first.

Short answer: yes.

You could do both at the same time, but it may get complicated if you're under a bankruptcy stay and the family court is trying to disburse the same assets subject to the stay.

Depending on the assets, you may be fine or you may have a headache. Talk to an experienced, local attorney for advice. They will be able to tell you the how the bankruptcy and divorce may affect each other.
